titles.title: Recognizing the 65th anniversary of the Bolton Act of 1943, creating the Cadet Nurse Corps.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
7/31/2008--Introduced.
Honors the 65th anniversary of the Bolton Act, which created the Cadet Nurse Corps, facilitating the training and careers of nurses.
